CreditCards.name: The Platinum Card® from American Express
CreditCards.instruction1: Earn 40,000 Membership Rewards® points after you use your new Card to make $3,000 in purchases in your first 3 months.
CreditCards.instruction2: 5X points for flights booked directly with airlines or with American Express Travel.

CreditCards.name: Citi® Hilton HHonors™ Visa Signature® Card
CreditCards.instruction1: Earn 75,000 Hilton HHonors™ Bonus Points after making $2,000 in purchases within the first 3 months of account opening*
CreditCards.instruction2: Earn 6 HHonors Bonus Points for each $1 spent at any participating hotel within the Hilton Portfolio.*

CreditCards.name: Gold Delta SkyMiles® Business Credit Card from American Express
CreditCards.instruction1: Make business travel more rewarding. Earn 30,000 bonus miles after you make $1,000 in purchases on your new Card within your first 3 months.
CreditCards.instruction2: Additionally, earn a $50 statement credit after you make a Delta purchase with your new Card within your first 3 months.
CreditCards.AnnualFee: $0 introductory annual fee for the first year, then $95

CreditCards.name: AAA Member Rewards Visa® Credit Card
CreditCards.instruction1: Receive a $100 statement credit when you make at least $500 in purchases within the first 90 days.
CreditCards.instruction2: 3X points = 3% cash back — Earn 3 points for every $1 spent on qualifying travel and AAA purchases.
CreditCards.balanceTransfersIntroAPR: 0% Intro APR for the first 12 billing cycles for balance transfers made in the first 60 days
CreditCards.regularAPR: 13.49% to 23.49% Variable APR on purchases and balance transfers

CreditCards.name: JetBlue Card
CreditCards.instruction1: Earn 5,000 bonus points after you spend $1,000 on purchases in the first 90 days.
CreditCards.instruction2: Earn 3 points per $1 on JetBlue purchases, 2 points per $1 at restaurants and grocery stores and 1 point per $1 on all other purchases.
CreditCards.balanceTransfersIntroAPR: 0% introductory APR for First 12 billing cycles following each balance transfer that posts to account within 45 days of acco

CreditCards.name: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express
CreditCards.instruction1: Limited Time Offer: Apply by 5/3/17 – Earn 10% cash back on purchases at U.S. Restaurants in the first 6 months, up to $200 back.
CreditCards.instruction2: Plus, earn $150 back after you spend $1,000 in purchases on your new Card within the first 3 months.

CreditCards.name: NHL® Discover it® Card
CreditCards.instruction1: Choose your favorite team & show your pride –all 30 teams available. Save 10% at Shop.NHL.com and NHL.TV™.
CreditCards.instruction2: Get a dollar-for-dollar match of all the cash back you've earned at the end of your first year, automatically.

CreditCards.name: Amtrak Guest Rewards® World Mastercard®
CreditCards.instruction1: Get 20,000 bonus points after you make at least $1,000 in purchases with your new card within 90 days of account opening
CreditCards.instruction2: Earn 3 Amtrak Guest Rewards points for every $1 you spend with Amtrak®, including travel and onboard purchases
CreditCards.regularAPR: 13.49% - 23.49% Variable APR on purchases and balance transfers

CreditCards.name: BuyPower Card from Capital One®
CreditCards.instruction1: 5% Earnings on your first $5,000 in purchases every year. Unlimited 2% Earnings on every purchase after that. Redeem Earnings toward the purchase or lease of a new Chevrolet, Buick, GMC or Cadillac vehicle.
CreditCards.instruction2: No annual fee, no redemption limits, no Earnings expiration, no foreign transaction fees. Save even more when you combine your available Earnings with most current GM offers and incentives.

CreditCards.name: The Business Platinum® Card from American Express OPEN
CreditCards.instruction1: Welcome Offer: Earn up to 75,000 Membership Rewards® points.
CreditCards.instruction2: Earn 50,000 Membership Rewards points after you spend $10,000 and an extra 25,000 points after you spend an additional $10,000 all on qualifying purchases within your first 3 months of Card Membership.
